QuestData.Title: The Ambush
QuestData.Description: The vrykuls in Baleheim is completely defeated, no doubt about it. But still their leader stays in town and won't give up.$B$BGorth sends Lydell and his assassins to make good ambush to the northwest. You talk to Lydell and figure out how to get Vrykul chieftain to come out. Then you kill him. You kill him real good.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Lydell at Lydell's Ambush.
QuestData.RewardText: We all showed up to the party, but the guest of honor stayed at home.$B$B
